backend/main.mo: Defines core backend data types for tasks, meetings, reminders, messaging, clients, invoices, notifications, and workflow automation.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing implemented features, affected files, related components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short textual summaries for major frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, PWA manifest, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon containing a gradient background and a stylized 'W'.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Offline fallback page with a gradient background, status message, and reload button.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing network‑first navigation handling, cache‑first assets, offline fallback, and update lifecycle control.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up authentication-aware root layout and configures routes for navigation hub and multiple dashboard sections.
frontend/src/components/AdminDatabaseDas: Provides an admin-only database viewer with tabs, search, record inspection, and formatted status displays.
frontend/src/components/AIAssistantPanel: Displays AI-generated productivity insights by analyzing tasks, meetings, and reminders with suggestion logic.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentManag: Manages user appointments including create, edit, status updates, and delete actions with dialogs and forms.
frontend/src/components/ClientManagement: Handles CRUD operations for clients with dialogs, form validation, and associations to tasks and appointments.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a styled footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A header component that displays branding, theme toggle, notifications, and user profile with logout handling.
frontend/src/components/InvoiceManagemen: Manages invoice creation, filtering, payment actions, and printing, using query hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/InvoicePrintView: Renders a printable invoice layout showing client details, status, descriptions, and totals.
frontend/src/components/KanbanBoard.tsx: Displays and synchronizes a Kanban board with user tasks, supporting drag‑and‑drop, updates, and persistence.
frontend/src/components/MailNotification: Creates sample or custom mail notifications for testing via user input or quick actions.
frontend/src/components/MessagingPanel.t: Implements a full chat UI for viewing groups, creating groups, selecting a group, loading messages, and sending messages via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/NotificationCent: Provides a popover-based notification center for system and mail notifications with sorting, marking read, dismissing, and click handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Renders a simple profile creation form that saves a user’s name and department through a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/RemindersPanel.t: Displays, creates, edits, and deletes reminders, including invoice-related reminders, with time scheduling and sorting.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleView.tsx: Manages a calendar interface for creating, editing, and deleting meetings with participants and time ranges.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerUpd: Shows an update prompt when a new service worker is available and triggers a refresh when accepted.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorBoun: Wraps startup components in an error boundary that renders a fallback UI when initialization errors occur.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorFall: UI fallback component showing startup errors with reload and reset actions.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Task management UI providing creation, editing, filtering, and list/kanban views using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/TimeManagement.t: Dashboard component summarizing tasks, meetings, reminders, and completion statistics by day, week, and month.
frontend/src/components/WorkflowAutomati: Interface for viewing, creating, updating, and deleting workflow automation rules and logs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, admin, and workflow data via the backend actor. Includes admin-specific queries and user profile utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, and custom utility classes like glassmorphism and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/ClientPortal.tsx: Empty page placeholder for the client portal.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tab-based navigation for tasks, schedule, reminders, messaging, clients, automation, and admin panels.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a styled login screen using Internet Identity with feature highlights and animated visuals.
frontend/src/pages/NavigationHub.tsx: Shows a hub of navigation cards for major app sections, conditionally revealing admin-only options.
frontend/src/utils/pwaReset.ts: Provides utilities to clear caches and service workers for resetting the PWA and reloading the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, shadows, radii, plugins, and summer-themed color utilities.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known issues, and existing feature requirements for the WorkflowHub project.
